ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.jupiter.server
Interface ServerLogic

All Superinterfaces:
DocumentServerLogic
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerLogicImpl
public interface ServerLogic
extends DocumentServerLogic

Extended interface for internal use of the server logic.

Field Summary

          The participant id of the publisher.
 
Method Summary
 void invite(RemoteUser user)
          Invites the given user to the session.

          Kicks the participant with the given id from the session.

shutdown

void shutdown()
Shuts the server logic down. The server logic takes care that the associated document server is shut down too.
